EmailTemplate.name: Collaboration coming soon
EmailTemplate.subject: The wait is almost over
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Mr./Ms. {!Contact.LastName},
I am delighted to share with you more information on ***[Collaboration]***!
We have different models coming up, such as ***[Model]***. See more details in my next message. These pieces will be released on ***[date]***, and will be going fast.
Which model do you like in particular?
Best,
{!User.Name} RIMOWA {!User.Base_Store_Code__c} Tel:{!User.Mobile} RIMOWA.com
